items.sentence: I didn't know Tom wanted to do that with us.
I didn't know Tom needed to do that anymore.
Are you and Tom really going to get married?
I want Tom to learn how to play the trumpet.
I hope that Tom Jackson doesn't get elected.
I hope this will make things easier for you.
I hope Tom doesn't find out what we've done.
We're hoping for a better outcome this time.
I hope Tom will have the courage to do that.
I hope Tom will have the courage to show up.
I hope that Tom finds some kind of job soon.
Tom let Mary know that he needed to do that.
Tom let Mary know he didn't like doing that.
I'm going to read this book on the airplane.
Did you have to study French in high school?
That's what we need to focus on doing first.
If there's a way out of here, we'll find it.
I'd suggest that you do that this afternoon.
Tom has the same kind of dog that Mary does.
I'll be going to go back to Australia again.
